summary.body: Hello! I'm Khaled, a Full-Stack Developer with a passion for building and developing web applications. I specialize in both front-end and back-end development, using technologies like React, PHP, and MySQL, along with an interest in cybersecurity and performance optimization. My goal is to deliver innovative digital solutions that offer exceptional user experiences and meet project needs effectively.

about.name: Khaled
about.title: With us, designing your website is easier and faster!
about.desc: A full-stack web developer with 3 years of experience in building and enhancing web applications using modern technologies. I have strong skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Redux, Sass, PugJS, and Bootstrap, along with backend expertise in PHP, MySQL, and Laravel. My goal is to deliver creative solutions that meet client needs and provide the best user experience.
